verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There are two roads you may take
One by sight, one by faith
Take the Word of God or what you see,
What you believe is what will be.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Set your wings to the winds of faith
You can fly in a higher place.
Do not struggle, it's by grace.
Set your wings to the winds of faith

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
What's your need, what's your cry,
What's your mountain much too high.
Speak the Word of God, and by and by,
It will move or you will fly.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Watch the eagle in the sky,
He does not struggle, he does not strive.
For the power that makes him rise,
is already in the sky.
